metadata.title: grafana: An information leak issue was discovered in Grafana through 7.3.4, when integrated with Zabbix (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Grafana when integrated with Zabbix. The Zabbix password can be found in the api_jsonrpc.php HTML source code. When the user logs in and allows the user to register, one can right-click to view the source code and use Ctrl-F to search for the password in api_jsonrpc.php to discover the Zabbix account password and URL address.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
grafana is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
